name: Eucerin Advanced Hydration SPF 50 Sunscreen Spray, Lightweight Spray Sunscreen with Hyaluronic Acid and Humectants, Hypoallergenic, Fragrance and Alcohol Free, 6 Oz Bottle
short_description: HSA ELIGIBLE/FSA ELIGIBLE SUNSCREEN: Includes one 6 ounce bottle of Eucerin Sun Advanced Hydration SPF 50 Sunscreen Spray
FIVE AOX SHIELD FORMULA: This spray sunscreen SPF 50 is enriched with 5 antioxidants (Glycyrrhetinic Acid, Licochalcone A, Vitamin E, Vitamin C, Oxynex ST) and Hyaluronic Acid to help hydrate skin(1)

ALL-DAY HYDRATION: Body sunscreen formula with Hyaluronic Acid and Humectants, Advanced Hydration attracts and replenishes skin's natural moisture for an immediate and long-lasting, 8-hour hydrating effect
INVISIBLE FINISH: Lightweight, non greasy sunscreen with a dry touch finish that leaves no visible residue
DERMATOLOGIST DEVELOPED: Developed with dermatologists, this hydrating sunscreen spray is non-comedogenic (won't clog pores)
FORMULATED WITHOUT: This hypoallergenic sunscreen for sensitive skin is free of fragrance, alcohol, oil, dyes, parabens, PABA, phthalates, oxybenzone and octinoxate
product_description: Eucerin Sun Advanced Hydration SPF 50 Sunscreen Spray is a fragrance free sunscreen enriched with Hyaluronic Acid and Humectants to attract and replenish skin’s natural moisture, leaving skin hydrated and supple for up to 8 hours. This body sunscreen spray features UVA/UVB sun protection plus an Advanced Antioxidant Complex, 5 AOX Shield, that goes beyond neutralizing to also guard from free radicals and help support skin health. This lightweight sunscreen spray dries clear, leaving no visible residue. It is also a water resistant sunscreen (up to 80 minutes). Eucerin Sun Advanced Hydration Sunscreen Spray SPF 50 comes in a convenient spray bottle for hard-to-reach areas. Developed with dermatologists, this spray on sunscreen is suitable for sensitive skin and is free of fragrance, alcohol, dyes, parabens, PABA, phthalates, oxybenzone and octinoxate. Eucerin is a dermatologist-recommended skincare brand that is based on an uncompromising approach to science. (1)with continuous use. Use as directed with other Sun Protection Measures (See Drug Facts Box)

name: Alba Botanica Sunscreen Spray for Face and Body, Broad Spectrum SPF 50 Sunscreen, Hawaiian Coconut, Water Resistant and Biodegradable, 5 fl. oz. Bottle
short_description: SPF 50 SUN PROTECTION: Recommended by the Skin Cancer Foundation, this water-resistant, broad-spectrum sunscreen helps shield the skin from harmful UV rays
BEACH ESSENTIAL: Made with 100% vegetarian ingredients and botanicals, our biodegradable SPF 50 formula offers sun protection your skin will love
COCONUT SUNSCREEN: A lightweight and quick-drying sunscreen spray featuring ingredients like aloe vera, safflower oil, avocado oil, and fragrant coconut
DISCOVER ALBA BOTANICA SUN CARE: Build out your sun care collection with Alba Botanica's complete line of sunscreen sprays, sunscreen lotions, mineral-based sunscreens, and after-sun products
HAWAIIAN SUNSCREEN SPRAY: Includes one 5 fl. oz. bottle of Alba Botanica Hawaiian Coconut Sunscreen Spray, SPF 50
product_description: Help prevent sun damage and premature signs of aging with Alba Botanica's SPF 50 Hawaiian Coconut Sunscreen Spray. This lightly scented coconut sunscreen provides up to 80 minutes of water resistance for broad-spectrum protection that helps shield your skin from harmful UV rays. Featuring a botanical blend of aloe vera, safflower oil, and sunflower oil, Alba Botanica's cruelty-free and biodegradable formula dries quickly without feeling heavy or sticky. Complete your daily skincare routine and apply this air-powered mist in the morning, or as needed throughout the day, for sun care that lets your natural beauty shine.

name: Seaweed Bath Co. Clear Guard SPF 40 Sport Broad Spectrum Sunscreen - Quick Dry, Air-Powered Spray - Natural Tropical Scent - With Sustainably Harvested Seaweed, Aloe, Avocado Oil - 6 oz
short_description: Goes On Clear: Clear Guard SPF 40 is a hydrating sunscreen that sprays on clear with a natural, tropical scent. Air-powered spray aerosol for easy application that dries quickly.
SPF 40 Protection: Water resistant up to 80 minutes. Made with 3% Avobenzone, 5% Octisalate and 10% Octocrylene, this formula is free of oxybenzone and octinoxate.
Hydrating Sun Care: Aloe soothes sun-drenched skin, avocado oil hydrates, and sustainably-harvested Atlantic seaweed nourishes skin. For all skin types & tones.
Marine-derived Ingredients: Sustainably-harvested seaweed with 65+ vitamins and minerals helps protect skin against harmful ultra violet rays while green tea helps protect skin from free radicals.
How to Apply: Shake well before use. Apply generously & evenly 15 minutes before sun exposure & reapply at least every two hours or after 80 minutes of swimming.

product_description: Enjoy trusted sun protection without the white cast with Coppertone Every Tone Sunscreen Spray SPF 50. Formulated to blend in clear on all skin tones, this SPF 50 sunscreen spray leaves behind no white residue. It offers a water-resistant formula (80 minutes) with Broad Spectrum UVA/UVB protection and stops up to 98% of damaging UV rays. Coppertone Every Tone Sunscreen Spray is a moisturizing spray sunscreen with a lightweight formula that comes in a convenient spray format and dries quickly. Formulated with nourishing Vitamin E, skin is left feeling soft and moisturized. This non-greasy, fragrance free sunscreen spray is also free of oxybenzone, octinoxate, PABA and phthalates. Coppertone Every Tone Sunscreen Spray is advised by dermatologists for all skin tones. Every sunscreen Coppertone develops follows a tradition of trusted, quality sun protection products. Coppertone has been providing innovation for more than 75 years, and was voted the most trusted sunscreen brand.(1) Use and reapply this spray on sunscreen SPF 50 as directed. (1)Voted Most Trusted Sunscreen Brand by American Shoppers Based on the 2022 BrandSpark American Trust Study—Multi Year Winner.
